text: Hi, <@U05E77XEY4V>. Thanks for letting <@U06LU432THN> and me know. We will send an email to Blair.
Regarding the channel, would you mind creating a Sequences channel as well? Thank you
Hi <@U07L37N4F9U>, I brought that suggestion up to Blair. Since he is the PM driving the Sequences API, he will need to do it!
has renamed the channel from "automation-api-beta" to "automation-workflows-api-beta"

Hi <@UQNEXHW14>
I noticed that you changed the channel name.
Are you willing to create another channel dedicated to *automation/sequences*? :hugging_face:

Per the thread of <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C076YMWHZQS/p1727096402018439?thread_ts=1727096402.018439&cid=C076YMWHZQS|this discussion> yesterday, we're asking the PM of the sequences team to do it so they have ownership of the channel. It should be created soon.
I somehow missed that that was your thread :facepalm:. My mistake. I can follow up and make sure that happens.
